platform.name: Knowway
platform.description: A learning platform for online and in-person courses

pages./course.html?id=X: View course details, lessons, and enroll
pages./profile.html: User profile, points balance, and settings
pages./in-person.html: Search for in-person learning places nearby

filters.search: Search by course title or instructor name

pricing.free_courses: Courses marked as free can be enrolled without points
pricing.paid_courses: Paid courses require points to enroll
pricing.earning_points: Complete courses to earn points (default 500 pts per course)

features.favorites: Save courses to wishlist using heart icon
features.lessons: Courses contain video lessons with progress tracking
features.quizzes: Final quiz required to complete course (85% to pass)
features.chat: Discussion chat available within enrolled courses
features.in_person: Search Google Maps for nearby learning centers

user_roles.learner: Can browse, enroll, and take courses

example_queries.find_free_courses: Go to /explore.html and courses marked 'Free' require no points
example_queries.filter_by_category: On /explore.html use the Category dropdown (Development, Design, Marketing)
example_queries.filter_by_level: On /explore.html use the Level dropdown (Beginner, Intermediate, Advanced)
example_queries.check_progress: Go to /learning.html to see enrolled courses and completion percentage
example_queries.earn_points: Complete course lessons and pass the quiz to earn points
example_queries.find_in_person: Go to /in-person.html and search for learning places in your city
example_queries.become_teacher: Contact the super admin at aa@knowway.com to request teacher access
